entry.title: $2500 // Brand New 1BD. Trendy Crown Heights. Central AC. 6 Weeks Free!
entry.content:
This brand new apartment features beautiful hardwood floors, stainless steel applicances, queen- sized bedroom with large closets and central AC.

UNIT FEATURES:

* Queen- sized bedrooms
* Central AC/ Heat
* Large Kitchen Cabinets
* Hardwood floors
* Brand new, modern light fixtures
* Stainless Steel Applicances
* High Ceilings
* Modern finishes & appliances
* Large Closets
* Huge, sun-drenched windows
* Ample cabinetry

BUILDING AMENITIES:

* Rooftop
* Large Laundry room
* On-site Super
* Virtual Doorman

* Net Effective Price advertised*

Short Walk to 2/3/4/5 Franklin Ave or 3 at Nostrand, Propect Park, Brooklyn Museum and more!
